articles.author: Seb Starcevic
articles.title: Israel urges NATO to expel Turkey over threats to ‘invade’ - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Israel’s foreign ministry demanded Turkey’s “expulsion from the regional alliance.”
articles.content:
Just like we entered Karabakh, just like we entered Libya, we will do [something] similar exactly to them, Erdoan said, referring to Turkeys past military interventions.
His saber-rattling sparked a… [+735 chars]
